channel.title: Stop massing with bows?
channel.description: is there anyway to stop massing with bows? i used a action timer but when you range them and click again youll run over and attack them. itd be nice if someone could tell me how and dont say just add a int.

item.title: Stop massing with bows?
item.dc:creator: @openice123 openice123
item.description:
@openice123 wrote:

is there anyway to stop massing with bows?
i used a action timer but when you range them and click again youll run over and attack them.
itd be nice if someone could tell me how and dont say just add a int.
